post.text:
We are blowing through our goal, help us raise $2,000,000 by midnight!!! 

Donate Here: http://bit.ly/29VYsQq

comment.author: Ariana
comment.text: Help Trump raise money, money that he FIRST reimburses his and his kids' companies for expenses, anything left over goes to the campaign.

replies.author: Diana
replies.text: He doesn't need to run you idiot. He could be playing golf but he prefers to help the American people

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Should help yourself with a trip to the hair salon
